Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Installer
Reviews.Content: Clears up any and all noise caused by ground loops such as rolling lines or flickering. Easy install, and excellent pricing! Shield's Electronics in Knoxville, TN sells these for 28 bucks.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says.
Reviews.Author: Hitech "Hitech 32"
Reviews.Content: After installing a camera system, i had a one channel with a rolling and slightly ghosted image. After isolating the problem channel's power and adding this ground loop isolator. The problem was gone and the channel was crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: Does not work
Reviews.Author: Marla Coster
Reviews.Content: Tec guy at CCTV told me this would fix the problem I was having. When I plugged this in I lost all picture to camera. This did not work and I bought two of them. Both did nothing made it worse

Reviews.Title: Sometimes These Can Solve A Problem
Reviews.Author: ROY WINTERS
Reviews.Content: These didn't solve the immediate problem that I have (cross-talk in a dual CAT-5e video run), but I was only slightly hopeful that they would.  I have used similar products in the past and sometimes they eliminate the problem and I would think these would do the same.

ProductInfo.Features:
BNC male to BNC female, Passive type, no power needed.
Transmits a full motion monochrome video signal up to 1,900 ft., color video signal up to 980 ft.
Built-in TVS (Transient Voltage Suppressors) for surge protection.
Prevents CCTV system interference caused by conflicting power cables.
Eliminates picture tearing, cross talk and rolling.
ProductInfo.Name: Cctv BNC Ground Loop Isolator Video Surveillance
